notes: [Improved] Rest_AuthenticationsService::saveAuthenticationToken() is now checking if the tokenId from the authentication exists before using it
[Improved] Improved the installation process with PHP traits
[Fixed] Fixed a bug where options were not properly passed when using the DELETE method
[Added] Added support for custom methods when sending requests. Default is `get`
[Added] Added OAuth scope, authorization options and settings to authentications index
[Improved] Authentications index is now showing all OAuth providers even if they are not configured
[Improved] Changed default route to `rest/request/index` action in `RestPlugin::registerCpRoutes()`
[Improved] Improved `RestService::_sendRequest()` to check if OAuth provider exists before using it
[Improved] Improved `RestService::_sendRequest()` to check if token exists before using it
